title.narrative: Technical support of trained CSOs for the production in social media in Mali

description.narrative: Results. - 82 productions were made by CSOs. These productions have been published on the platforms of organizations as well as those of their authors, and reached more than 64,000 persons. - WOM is undoubtedly allowing an increased use of the social media by the CSOs in Mali, though a strong civil space and though the poor technological context

The 10 Malian CSOs who benefited from the capacity building workshop on the use of social networks, continued the information campaign, through social networks, on women's rights, and the obstacles to these rights in Mali. The campaign was conducted according to a plan developed by these CSOs, supervised by a local consultant who is an influencer, experienced in community management, and in community management training.
